SEARCH
Package com.hexaware.dao

Class TaxService

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.TaxService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaxService
public class TaxService extends Object implements ITaxService
This class provides services related to tax management such as calculating tax, retrieving tax details by ID, retrieving taxes for employees, and retrieving taxes for a specific tax year. It implements the ITaxService interface.
